content: Approach carefully and deal with the Tenner and the Flamlings that will appear as soon as you're close to the cart.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Valley Entrance' and the sub-subsection 'A Note on Flamlings'.
The content is as follows:
Approach carefully and deal with the Tenner and the Flamlings that will appear as soon as you're close to the cart.
